change.description: Set Xperimental shuttle as Terran owned before destruction to prevent 'Ship Destroyed ' message

param.name: AnxietySeconds
param.comment: Number of seconds needed to be fully aggitated

param.comment: How close the player must be (in metres)

param.comment: How long the object must be scanned for (seconds)
